price: [Guyyaan sun] guyyaa Garriin (xurumbaan) afuufamee isinis garee gareen dhuftanuudha.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri fatatūna afwājan
